snippet: General Motors is concerned that the so-called valet mode offered in the new Corvette Stingray may run afoul of eavesdropping laws in some states.
abstract: General Motors is concerned that so-called valet mode in the 2015 Corvette model may run afoul of eavesdropping laws in some states; feature allows owners to surreptitiously record video and audio when the car is in the hands of other drivers.
